        public Shape(java.awt.Color color,
             int thickness,
             boolean isFill,
             boolean hasBorder)
        Constructs a Shape object
        Parameters:
        color - (Color of the current Shape)
        thickness - (size of the current stroke)
        isFill - ( used to check whether to draw or fill in shape)
        hasBorder - (used to check whether to draw border or not)
